Water content of sample m in % By RMM

Bulk Density of sample Yb = Ww / V in gm/cc
Dry Density of sample Yd = (100 Yb) / (100 + m)

tr.t-if: data.liquid_limit_visible and (data.liquid_limit_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.liquid_limit_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.plastic_limit_visible and (data.plasticity_index_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.plasticity_index_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.plastic_limit_visible and (data.plasticity_index_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.plasticity_index_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.fsi_visible and (data.max_fsi_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.max_fsi_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.heavy_visible and (data.heavy_table_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.heavy_table_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.light_omc_visible and (data.light_omc_table_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.light_omc_table_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.dry_density_visible and (data.degree_of_compaction_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.degree_of_compaction_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
data.moisture_content_visible and (data.moisture_content_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.moisture_content_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl and not fromEln)
